conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: Hi, this is PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1. How may I help you?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: Hi I am looking for a book called AE business and society by carroll and brown

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: A moment please let me check if we have it in our collection.

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: I need the 11th edition of this book but it is not available in library, and the professor has made it compulsory, hence is it a possibility if the library could make some arrangements for us?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: Buying the book is too expensive, hence it would be a great help

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: May I know which course is this book for and the name of your professor?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: AE business & society archei B Carroll, Jill brown, 11 edition

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: BGS as in Business, Government and Society?

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: I will drop an email to my colleague who will get in touch with your Professor about the purchase.

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: Oh but this request is personal

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: our prof hasn't asked us to ask the library

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: We do need to liaise with your professor to purchase the book for our course reserves collection.

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: No problem. Is there anything else I can help you with?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: No thank you so much for your time :)

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: I will cc you in my email. have a good evening PERSON_FIRSTNAME_3.
